events.message: We have received an application from Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position, including her resume and portfolio.
Jane Doe's application was categorized under Engineering as she applied for the software developer role.
Recruiter Emma Smith has been assigned to handle Jane Doe's recruitment process for the engineer position.
Initial screening call conducted with Jane Doe. She showed strong knowledge in software development and relevant technologies.
Jane Doe confirmed her availability and enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled a technical interview for Jane Doe on 2024-05-06 at 10:00 AM to evaluate her coding and problem-solving skills.
Jane Doe completed the technical interview with strong performance in algorithms and system design.
HR interview scheduled for Jane Doe on 2024-05-08 at 2:00 PM to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
HR interview completed successfully with Jane Doe expressing strong interest in the company culture and role.
An offer was proposed to Jane Doe including a competitive salary package and benefits tailored to her expectations.
Jane Doe responded positively to the offer and requested a few days for final consideration.
Jane Doe has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team.
Jane Doe's onboarding process commenced with orientation and introduction to the software engineering team.
The hiring process for Jane Doe was successfully completed, finalizing her joining as a Software Engineer.
